--- In gladiator@y..., "Daniel Paul Hightower" <dph_of_rules@y...> 
wrote:
> Ok, I was thinking.  [Oh no, we're all doomed because dph was 
> thinking.]
> 
> Perhaps, archmages should be limited to summoning up to 5 images at 
a 
> time and 5 fire elementals at a time.  Once an image is killed, the 
> archmage can summon another one and the same for a fire elemental.
> 
> Clerics should be limited to having 5 ghosts and 5 skeletons raised 
> from the dead at a time.
> 
> Druids would be limited to summoning 5 faeries at a time.
> 
> All this would make it harder for those characters to gain 
> mega-experience in just a few scenarios.

Hey Daniel nice idea if only Tom would pick up on it...
This is true because my friend and I played 2 clerics once and the 
biggest challenge was seeing who could get to the closest blood-spot 
first :).

Keep bringing up the great ideas and hope that you don't rip a rip in 
the time-space continum.
